Uses of Interface
org.wildfly.security.auth.realm.ldap.CredentialPersister

  • Packages that use CredentialPersister 
    Package Description
    org.wildfly.security.auth.realm.ldap
    Classes related to a SecurityRealm implementation capable of integrating with LDAP servers.

    • Uses of CredentialPersister in org.wildfly.security.auth.realm.ldap

      Classes in org.wildfly.security.auth.realm.ldap that implement CredentialPersister 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      (package private) class  OtpCredentialLoader
      A CredentialLoader for loading OTP credentials stored within defined attributes of LDAP entries.
      (package private) class  UserPasswordCredentialLoader
      A CredentialLoader for loading credentials stored within the 'userPassword' attribute of LDAP entries.
